msgtype.description: What type of message got send. 1 = Button pressed, 2 = Status message, 5 = join

btnNfirst.description: Shows if the button nord is first pressed

btnEfirst.description: Shows if the button east is first pressed

btnSfirst.description: Shows if the button south is first pressed

btnWfirst.description: Shows if the button west is first pressed

btnNpressed.description: Shows if the button nord is pressed

btnEpressed.description: Shows if the button east is pressed

btnSpressed.description: Shows if the button south is pressed

btnWpressed.description: Shows if the button west is pressed
